[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Adds some heavy industries to the game.
Original Developers: eatKenny, duduluu Current Developer: TrashedDT Translators: Drakuv (Italian), TeiXeR (German)
[h1][b]Compatible with existing save and other mods, enjoy it.[/b][/h1]
[h1][b]How to build a deep mine:[/b][/h1] 1. Buy a 'skydriller callmaker' 2. Install and active it 3. Wait for the plasma beam to make a 'mine hole' 4. Build a 'deep mine' on the mine hole
[h1][b]New stuff:[/b][/h1] - concrete - high-grade steel (Electric Arc Furnace + 75 steel) - copper - aluminium - skydriller callmaker - Used to create mining holes for the deep mine.
Note: To active the skydriller callmake: 1) Place in the desired location 2) After selecting a pawn, right click on the callmake and choose 'Activate".
[h1][b]New bench:[/b][/h1] - concrete mixer - electric arc furnace (required research: Electricity) - deep mine - unlimited raw materials (required research: Deep Drilling)
[h1][b]New power building:[/b][/h1] - industrial cable - never short circuits - industrial battery - never short circuits - nuclear power plant - Use uranium to produce massive amounts of power (20kW)
[h1][b]New trader ship:[/b][/h1] - deep space mining ship
[h1][b]Mod Suport:[/b][/h1] - Glitter Tech - Titanium added to Deep Mine - Cupro's Alloy - Metals added to Deep Mine, Industrialisation recipes replaced by Cupro's copper and aluminum
